description: Numbers n such that 97^n - 96^n is a strong pseudoprime.
prog: (PARI) L=0; forprime(n=L,L+1999, ispseudoprime(97^n-96^n)&&print1(" "n", ")) \\ To show progress, insert the following statement before "ispseudoprime": n>L && print1("/*"L"*/")+L+=50; - _M. F. Hasler_, Sep 21 2013, PARI syntax updated and non-ASCII characters removed on Sep 08 2014
author: _Mike Oakes_, May 18 2001, May 19 2001
